name: Flex Icon Set
description:
For 12 years, Streamline has made the largest, most consistent icon sets on the internet. This is a minimalistic icon set, with elegant and smooth curves. These icons are super easy to adapt to your project since they have only two colors.

The Flex Free set is open-source and you can use these for free for all personal and commercial projects. ðŸŽ‰
